Instance Property# videoRendition

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
var videoRendition: AVMetricMediaRendition { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetricPlayerItemVariantSwitchStartEvent/videoRendition#discussion)

Contains information corresponding to the currently selected video rendition.
